4) Is θ23 maximal? Because of its excellent energy resolution NOvA can make ~1% measurements of muon neutrino disappearance using quasi- elastic channel

muon neutrino disappearance using quasi-
elastic channel

5) Are neutrinos their own antiparticles?
5) Are neutrinos their
own antiparticles?

Avignonee, Elliott, Engel, arXiv:0708.1033
Avignonee, Elliott, Engel, arXiv:0708.1033

If NOvA establishes inverted hierarchy and next generation of 0νββ experiments see nothing, then it is very likely that neutrinos are Dirac particles
If NOvA establishes inverted hierarchy
and next generation of 0νββ experiments
see nothing, then it is very likely that
neutrinos are Dirac particles
